DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate bioequivalence fix dose combination ( FDC ) tablet canagliflozin metformin immediate release ( IR ) comparison individual component canagliflozin metformin IR .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Bioequivalence Fixed Dose Combination ( FDC ) Tablets Canagliflozin Metformin Immediate Release ( IR ) With Respect Individual Components Canagliflozin Metformin IR Tablets Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label ( identity study drug know volunteer study staff ) , single-center study evaluate bioequivalence canagliflozin metformin IR administer orally ( mouth ) individual component ( ie , separate tablet canagliflozin metformin IR ) ( Treatment A ) administer fix dose combination ( FDC ) tablet ( ie , canagliflozin metformin IR tablet ) ( Treatment B ) . Healthy volunteer participate study randomly ( chance ) assign receive Treatment A follow Treatment B Treatment B follow Treatment A period approximately 15 day treatment .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 30 kg/mÂ² inclusive body weight less 50 kg History current medical illness , abnormal value hematology clinical chemistry laboratory test , abnormal physical examination , vital sign 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) deem clinically significant Investigator
